title: Upcoming Shroud Encounter Talks with Russ Breault
post: There are more in the pipeline including Chattanooga, Chicago, Ontario, Atlanta and Ft. Lauderdale.  I will provide details as it gets closer.
author: Russ Breault

title: Upcoming Shroud Encounter Talks with Russ Breault
post:
Ontario! I’m hoping you mean Ontario, Canada…and hopefully Toronto. I definately would not miss it this time around.
R
author: Ron

title: Upcoming Shroud Encounter Talks with Russ Breault
post: Ron,  I will be in Kitchener, Ontario March 21, 22 and 23.  I will be at Blessed Sacrament Catholic Church as part of an exhibit of the Vancouver Shroud Association.  Hope you can make it!  Times are 7:00 PM thurs and friday and 1:00 and 8:00 on Saturday.
author: Shroud Encounter
